body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Vincenzo's Benzos! My name is Gerald Powell. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gerald, I'm interested in learning more about your sedan models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure thing! May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my name is Sara Wright.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Sara! Could you please provide me with your contact number so I can send you more detailed information and updates?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's five five five, zero one two three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. Also, could you let me know your email address to send additional resources and promotions?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's sara.wright at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Sara. I'll send over some information on our latest sedan models and offers right away. Thank you for reaching out to Vincenzo's Benzos.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thanks, Gerald! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sara. Have a great day, and don't hesitate to contact us if you have any more questions. Goodbye!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gerald Powell and the customer's name is Sara Wright.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
